name: Foaming Facial Cleanser

name: Hydrating Facial Cleanser
description: Hydrating, non-foaming cleanser suitable for dry and normal skin.

name: Moisturizing Cream
description: Rich, long-lasting moisturizer for very dry skin, with ceramides.

description: Daily facial moisturizer with SPF 30 to protect skin from UV damage.

name: Resurfacing Retinol Serum
description: Lightweight retinol serum to help improve skin texture and tone.

name: PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion
description: Night-time lotion with reparative complex to hydrate while you sleep.
